name: Slender The Co-Op
description:
[Update 1.01]

-Fixed bugs from the lobby.
- Player speed increased to 14.
-Kate animation speed increased by 0.2 units.
-Kate speed increased to 10.
- During the camp, Kate can no longer damage.
- The gamejolta button is gray.
-Fixed bug with boot screen.
-When clamping shift + s, the stamina is not wasted
-When the client exits, the number of activated generators does not change.
